text: Spoiler: Not all of these pictures are me‚Ä¶ Happy Halloween from me and Hunter S. Thomcat. Post navigation 37 thoughts on ‚ÄúHappy Halloween, y‚Äôall.‚Äù Read comments below or add one. Fantastic! Happy Halloween!! I cannot BELIEVE it never occurred to me to dress my dogs as me for Halloween! Happy spookyday! Wait‚Ä¶which one(s) are you? Love the pictures! Thanks for sharing. hahahaha. He really channeled you for his photo shoot. Happy Halloween!! How in the world do you get Hunter to stay still for such shenanigans? I love HSTC‚Ä¶I could just squeeze him‚Ä¶(nicely). Happy Halloween. Now you just need to do one where one of the cats has a towel wrapped around its head and a smaller/toy cat (Rolly) on top! Hunter has achieved expert level of tolerance because he loves you that much üòç Oh, Hunter is such a good kitty! Happy Halloween, Jenny! Yaaasss! Happy Halloween! Yay you two roller babes! Happy Halloween I have Reese‚Äôs at my house, Handsome! That is the sweetest treat of all!! Happy Halloween and thanks for the great cat pics‚Ä¶. Plus you, too! Hunter S Thomcat is absolutely adorable! Some of the cutest kitty pics I have ever seen üòª. Please give him a hug and kiss from me. MamaMeow Happy Halloween! What a patient and tolerant cat, and very cute! OMG I LOVE THIS! Happy Diwaloween! (Diwali and Halloween fall on the same day and I wish I could send you the GIF my nieces sent me of Diwali skeleton dancers) I love these photos! And that iconic picture of you in hair rollers. I never learned how to use hair rollers ‚Äì I never knew exactly how to place them to end up with curls or with the Texas big hair. I think after I saw your picture, I was inspired to try again and bought some more hair rollers, but I still don‚Äôt really know where to position curlers in my hair. I LOVE Hunter S. Thomcat! He is such a good sport. HOW did you ever find each other? I‚Äôm pretty sure you two are the Human/Feline Definition of Soulmates. Have you seen ‚ÄúWhatever Happened to Baby Jane?‚Äù? It‚Äôs a psychological thriller from the 60s starring Joan Crawford and Bette Davis. Even for its time it‚Äôs a disturbing film. I can see the family resemblance! You both are rocking the old school curlers! A-DOR-a-ble, Mr TomCat, utterly adorable . . . Happy Halloween to you and Hunter! üòÄ Absolutely adorable! Happy Halloween! Happy Halloween, dear. I know how much you love this time of year. Hunter is adorable. Stay safe. Happy Halloween, Jenny (and Hunter S. Tomcat)! Spoiler: Not all of these pictures are me‚Ä¶

Happy Halloween from me and Hunter S. Thomcat.

Post navigation

37 thoughts on ‚ÄúHappy Halloween, y‚Äôall.‚Äù

Read comments below or add one.

  1. Fantastic! Happy Halloween!!

  2. I cannot BELIEVE it never occurred to me to dress my dogs as me for Halloween! Happy spookyday!

  3. Wait‚Ä¶which one(s) are you?

  5. Love the pictures! Thanks for sharing.

  7. hahahaha. He really channeled you for his photo shoot.
    Happy Halloween!!

  8. How in the world do you get Hunter to stay still for such shenanigans?

  10. I love HSTC‚Ä¶I could just squeeze him‚Ä¶(nicely). Happy Halloween.

  11. Now you just need to do one where one of the cats has a towel wrapped around its head and a smaller/toy cat (Rolly) on top!

  13. Hunter has achieved expert level of tolerance because he loves you that much üòç

  14. Oh, Hunter is such a good kitty! Happy Halloween, Jenny!

  15. Yaaasss! Happy Halloween!

  16. Yay you two roller babes! Happy Halloween

  18. I have Reese‚Äôs at my house, Handsome!

  22. That is the sweetest treat of all!!

  23. Happy Halloween and thanks for the great cat pics‚Ä¶. Plus you, too!

  24. Hunter S Thomcat is absolutely adorable! Some of the cutest kitty pics I have ever seen üòª. Please give him a hug and kiss from me.

    MamaMeow

  25. Happy Halloween!
    What a patient and tolerant cat, and very cute!

  26. OMG I LOVE THIS! Happy Diwaloween! (Diwali and Halloween fall on the same day and I wish I could send you the GIF my nieces sent me of Diwali skeleton dancers)

  27. I love these photos! And that iconic picture of you in hair rollers. I never learned how to use hair rollers ‚Äì I never knew exactly how to place them to end up with curls or with the Texas big hair. I think after I saw your picture, I was inspired to try again and bought some more hair rollers, but I still don‚Äôt really know where to position curlers in my hair.

  28. I LOVE Hunter S. Thomcat! He is such a good sport.
    HOW did you ever find each other?
    I‚Äôm pretty sure you two are the Human/Feline Definition of Soulmates.

  29. Have you seen ‚ÄúWhatever Happened to Baby Jane?‚Äù? It‚Äôs a psychological thriller from the 60s starring Joan Crawford and Bette Davis. Even for its time it‚Äôs a disturbing film.

  31. I can see the family resemblance! You both are rocking the old school curlers!

  32. A-DOR-a-ble, Mr TomCat, utterly adorable . . .

  33. Happy Halloween to you and Hunter! üòÄ

  34. Absolutely adorable!
    Happy Halloween!

  35. Happy Halloween, dear. I know how much you love this time of year. Hunter is adorable. Stay safe.

  37. Happy Halloween, Jenny (and Hunter S. Tomcat)!
